translations: n．报酬，赔偿：给予以补偿或回报的东西，通常是金钱或其他有价值的物品。
· He received recompenses for his hard work.
他因努力工作而获得了报酬。
v．报答，补偿：给予某人以回报或补偿。

sentences.sentence: For it is the day of the vengeance of the Lord, the year of recompenses of the judgment of Sion.
sentences.translation: 因为这是上主复雠的日子，是为报复熙雍敌人的一年。

sentences.sentence: When the debtor does not fulfill the debt, the mortgagee is authorized the real estate auction obtained cost which mortgages legally first to receive recompenses.
sentences.translation: 当债务人不履行债务时，抵押权人有权依法以抵押的房地产拍卖所得的价款优先受偿。
